articles.title: Google to roll out new settings for smart features to personalise and save data on Gmail - India Today
articles.description: Google aims to give more control to users by rolling out settings for smart features that will save data used to process these tools. Smart features in Gmail include Smart Compose and Smart Reply.
articles.content: Google recently rolled out an automatic delete feature for new users, the feature deletes user data every eighteen months unless users change the settings as per their preference. This data will incl… [+2135 chars]

articles.title: Apple to launch new iPad with mini-LED display and AirPods 3 in first half of 2021: Ming-Chi Kuo - India Today
articles.description: Trusted analyst Min-Chi Kuo believes that the Mini-LED iPad will go into mass production in the first half of 2021.
articles.content: Apple has had a busy 2020 with the company launching a number of new products this year, and now the latest reports suggest that the company will follow this up by launching its first iPads with Mini… [+1862 chars]
